message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Let's be practical, Alice. I'm feeling generous today, so I'll give you a larger share in the next round if we don't settle now.
Bob, I understand your generosity, but I believe we can find a fairer split. I'm offering you 45 this time.  Let's come to an agreement.
Alice, time is money! This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but the deal won't get any better.
